insert into t_mall_goods (id, name, time, pic_path, total, max_exchange_count, surplus, exchange_scroe, status, visible, introduction) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{picPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxExchangeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{surplus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{exchangeScroe,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{visible,jdbcType=BIT}, #{introduction,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_mall_goods set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pic_path = #{picPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total = #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER}, max_exchange_count = #{maxExchangeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, surplus = #{surplus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, exchange_scroe = #{exchangeScroe,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, visible = #{visible,jdbcType=BIT}, introduction = #{introduction,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, time, pic_path, total, max_exchange_count, surplus, exchange_scroe, status, visible, introduction from t_mall_goods where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
